page.title: 16PORTCHESTER PLAYGROUND GAMES
page.content: Ball games are popular all the year round. Games vary in seasons like conkers in the autumn and marbles in the summer. Some girls play marbles but other girls play skipping games. The most popular game at the moment is marbles, but some people prefer other games such as hom pom and five lives. Five lives is a game where you have a tennis ball, you let it bounce three times then you catch the ball and aim it at the person. If the ball hits the person he or she loses a life. Hom pom is a game where one person counts to a hundred and the others go and hide. If he sees them or finds them he runs back to his post and says "hom pom (name) one two three". If the person gets to the post before the person who's 'up' the person who's not 'up' says "hom pom me one two three".
